attributes.action: hold a genral election as the people of engaland are not been listened to
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i demand this petition so mr brown and the labour party can see for real how much the people of the uk have had enough of the labour party. we can not afford to support them any more and the working class people of the uk do not have expence allowances like mp's who do not understand the day to day living hell of a normal person.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
